source_objects.title: 3D & Animation
source_objects.description: Learn the XYZ of 3D and animation design using Autodesk Maya, Revit, Adobe After Effects, and more.

items.title: Fast animation and rigging techniques using Maya 2017
items.headline: Learn to rig a biped character and animate a walk cycle for film, TV and video games for beginner Maya users
objectives_summary: Rig a biped using Human IK in Maya
Rig a character using Quick rig one click and step by step methods
Animate a walk cycle and tweak it to show more weight

items.title: Create & Design a Modern Interior in Blender 2.8
items.headline: Learn how to design a realistic interior in Blender 3D!
objectives_summary: The students will have created their own interior scene in Blender
Have an understanding of interior design
Learn how to create realistic materials

items.title: SciFi Crate Design in Blender

visible_instructors.name: Josh
visible_instructors.title: Josh Gambrell
visible_instructors.job_title: Sharing my knowledge and constantly expanding it.

items.headline: Master the Hard-Surface Modeling workflow in Blender, and learn how to achieve proper lighting, materials, and renders.
objectives_summary: Hard Surface Modeling
Non Destructive Modeling
Boolean-Bevel workflow

items.title: Fusion 360 for 3D Printing - Creating Curved Bodies
items.headline: Learn to model curved bodies while designing a Wonder Woman Tiara.  Learn how to optimize your models for 3D Printing.
objectives_summary: Apply skills necessary to design custom curved geometry in their models
Apply useful skills in preparing models for 3D printing
Apply post processing techniques to their 3D prints for a finished look

items.title: The Complete Autodesk Navisworks Course (BIM Tool)

visible_instructors.name: Mohamed
visible_instructors.title: Mohamed Elhout, PMP, PMI-PBA
visible_instructors.job_title: Project Management | Planning & Control | Business Analysis

items.headline: Control your project outcomes by reviewing the project models with Autodesk Navisworks
objectives_summary: Manage 3D Construction Models and enable an effective review.
Learn more about Navisworks analysis and simulation tools
Create Construction 4D & 5D Simulation to check validity of construction schedules.

items.title: 3D Printing: From Start to Finish
items.headline: Create awesome 3D prints and finish them so they shine
objectives_summary: Choose the right FDM 3D printer for your needs
Understand how a FDM 3D printer works
Use "slicing" software to create great 3d Prints

items.title: Motion Typography from Scratch
items.headline: Learn how to use After Effects to create text based animations for music videos, film credits, advertisements and more.
objectives_summary: By the end of the course you will have all the necessary skills and knowledge to create stunning motion typography videos.

items.title: 3D Game Modeling & Animation With Blender
items.headline: Create 3D models and 3D animation for games and engines like Unreal or Unity 3D
objectives_summary: Be proficient at Blender for 3D modeling and animation
Create 3D characters in Blender
Animate 3D characters in Blender

items.title: Learn PTC Creo 5.0 (Pro-e) - Basic to Advance Guide

visible_instructors.name: SS eAcademy
visible_instructors.title: SS eAcademy .
visible_instructors.job_title: Learn Engineering Courses Online - On your Time

items.headline: Learn PTC Creo Parametric 5.0 at your time -  A Complete Guide
objectives_summary: Understanding Creo Parametric concepts
Create and modify 2D sketches on datum planes.
Sketching geometry and using tools

items.title: 3D Master, from zero to hero Vol.1: Zbrush Basics
items.headline: You’ll learn the basic functions of Zbrush for you to start your career as a 3D character creator.
objectives_summary: You’ll understand all the needed stages for modeling a 3D character, regardless of the character complexity, you’ll understand what are the sculpting stages and how to improve your character step by step.
You’ll also learn about some tools and techniques for sculpting and most importantly you’ll know when to use them.

items.title: Blender 2.8 Complete Beginners Guide to 3D Modelling a Scene
items.headline: Blender 2.8 3D modelling a medieval building scene with tips to go from novice to Blender expert in under 21 hours
objectives_summary: A complete guide to the functions, modifiers and shortcuts in Blender 2.8
How to use Blender 2.8 and create a medieval town house
Being able to walk away from this course and create any building to a high standard

items.title: The Complete Spine Game Rigging & Animation Course
items.headline: Start creating fantastic game animations today!
objectives_summary: Build rigable characters in Photoshop
Animate in Photoshop
Build character rigs in Spine

items.title: After Effects for Beginners Complete Intro to After Effects

visible_instructors.name: Andrew
visible_instructors.title: Andrew Pach
visible_instructors.job_title: Engaged and Passionate PowerPoint & After Effects instructor

items.headline: Complete Intro to After Effects - Learn After Effects CC typography and animation
objectives_summary: Get curious about After Effects and hungry to learn more
Improve the quality of Your videos by adding animations
Establish a healthy understanding of motion graphics

items.title: Save Time in Character Animation for After Effects
items.headline: Animation can be a fast process if you know the secret: Do Animation with rigged characters, with a few clicks and drags
objectives_summary: Rig a Character in After Effects
Animate your cartoon characters faster with just a few clicks and drags

items.title: Kinetic Typography in After Effects: Motion Graphics Course
items.headline: Create title sequences, animations, motion graphics, music videos and more! Learn in After Effects: no experience needed
objectives_summary: Learn the basics of After Effects
Learn advanced Kinetic Typography techniques
Be able to make your own amazing kinetic typography videos

items.title: Zbrush Facial Anatomy and Likeness Character Sculpting

visible_instructors.title: Victory3D LLC
visible_instructors.job_title: Dedicated to Transforming The Way Artists Create

items.headline: Learn How To Create A Realistic 3D Portrait in ZBrush Character Modeling
objectives_summary: Enhanced observational and visual skills
Understand the face anatomy in depth
Create realistic portrait
